Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.inventoryrelated.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Observable
model of player's inventory. it handles the discard process and updates the InventoryView accordingly via the observer pattern. base implementation has the inventory size of capacity 5. it has 3 arrays of size capacity: -items where the Items are stored -discardProgress where each inventory slot's discard progress is stored -discardCompleted where each inventory slot's discard state is stored

    array of size capacity that tracks the discard progress of each item

    items
    array that contains the inventory's items.

  • Field Details

    • items

      private Item[] items
      array that contains the inventory's items.

    • capacity

      private final int capacity
      the inventory's capacity.

    • discardProgress

      private int[] discardProgress
      array of size capacity that tracks the discard progress of each item

    • discardCompleted

      private boolean[] discardCompleted
      array of size capacity that tracks which item has completed the discard process

    • DISCARD_COMPLETION_TIME

      private int DISCARD_COMPLETION_TIME
      frames needed to completed an item discard

  • Constructor Details

    • Inventory

      public Inventory(int capacity)
      initializes the items array, discardProgress array, discardCompleted array based on the specified capacity. an inventory can contain Items, such as ComputerCard and PokerCard items.
      Parameters:
      capacity - capacity of the inventory

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Item item)
      adds the specified item into items. searches the first available slot, and notifies InventoryView to update its view.
      Parameters:
      item - item to add into items

    • isInventoryFull

      public boolean isInventoryFull()
      checks if the inventory is full
      Returns:
      true if inventory is full

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(int index)
      removes the item from the inventory items at the specified index. resets the discardProgress of the item once an item is removed from items, and notifies the InventoryView to remove the item's view.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the item to remove

    • removeComputerCard

      public void removeComputerCard(ComputerCard computerCard)
      removes the computer card from the inventory items and notifies InventoryView of the change.
      Parameters:
      computerCard - ComputerCard item

    • getComputerCard

      public ComputerCard getComputerCard()
      Returns:
      the ComputerCard item in the inventory if there is one

    • updateDiscardProgress

      public void updateDiscardProgress(int inventorySlotIndex, boolean keyHeld)
      updates the progress of the specified inventory slot if the number key is pressed. if the key is held until DISCARD_COMPLETION_TIME finishes, then the item will get discarded. otherwise, the discard progress will reset to 0.
      Parameters:
      inventorySlotIndex - item slot that is being discarded
      keyHeld - discard key held or not

    • getInventory

      public Inventory getInventory()
      Returns:
      this instance of the inventory

    • getItems

      public Item[] getItems()
      Returns:
      a copy of the inventory's items array

    • getCapacity

      public int getCapacity()
      Returns:
      the inventory's capacity

    • getItem

      public Item getItem(int index)
      returns an item at the specified index
      Parameters:
      index - index of the item in the inventory
      Returns:
      the Item at the specified inded

    • getDiscardProgress

      public float getDiscardProgress(int inventorySlotIndex)
      returns the progress of the discard progress at the specified inventory slot index
      Parameters:
      inventorySlotIndex - index of inventory slot
      Returns:
      the progress of the discard process
